nodes.text: Ta'rahg was a Kadas'sa'Nikto who lived on Nar Shaddaa during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstiuted Sith Empire. He had a shop on the Promenade, where he sold heavy armor.
Ta'rahg was created for Star Wars: The Old Republic, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game released by BioWare on December 20, 2011. He appears on Nar Shaddaa as an heavy armor vendor.
